dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I assume you've scanned the status logs...

dialogues.text: Gave up a brilliant future in. medicine as well, you've probably read. Turned his back on his whole life. Madness.

dialogues.speaker: THE OPERATIVE
dialogues.text: (CONTINUING)

dialogues.text: I. I would be very careful about what you --

dialogues.text: (SADLY)

dialogues.speaker: THE OPERATIVE
